summary: Container class that aggregates all outputs produced by a contrastive speech‑text model, including optional training loss, generated speech token IDs, similarity logits, projected embeddings for both modalities, pooled encoder outputs, and optional hidden‑state tensors.
business_intent: Facilitate easy access to model results for tasks such as speech‑text retrieval, evaluation, and fine‑tuning by packaging similarity scores, embeddings, and auxiliary information in a single structured object.
